title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.15 - Changes in legal status of group members
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 317.15 - Changes in legal status of group members

State Regulations

Any group member which undergoes any changes in its legal
status which results in the issuance of a new taxpayer identification number or
unemployment insurance number shall be required to complete a new participation
application and shall execute a new participation agreement. A group
self-insurer shall, within 10 days, notify the chair in writing of any such
change and shall, at that time, file the new application and
agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
317.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
